p: From the fragility of the healthcare system to vaccine production and from manufacturing to agricultural production, there were glaring gaps in the capacity of the country to locally produce and manufacture essential items required. Some farmers lost their harvest as enforcement agents lack the coordination on how to address such peculiar cases. This is a situation often experienced by many farmers as climate change impacts such as floods and drought wreak havoc on farmlands. During the lockdown, there were reports of exploitation by various enforcement agents.
